attributes.action: That the government urgently call for a National Day of Prayer
attributes.additional_details: To recognise our Christian heritage and to call upon our God for his mercy, grace and leading in this present climate of uncertainty.
attributes.background: Ask the people of this country on a specific day to spend time in prayer for the government, the people and businesses due to the current Coronavirus epidemic.

rejection.details:
This would be a matter for religious institutions, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307364

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
